name: Stephanie Fessler v. Watchtower Bible and Tract Society of New York, Inc., Christian Congregation of Jehovah's Witnesses, Inc., Spring Grove Congregation of Jehovah's Witnesses, Inc., Terry Jeanne Monheim; Petition of Spring Grove Congregation of Jehovah's Witnesses, Inc.

opinions.text:
PETITION FOR ALLOWANCE OF APPEAL
Denied.
53 Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
--------
